name: Acti-Air
description:
Welcome to Acti-Air!

Here you will run fast, jump super high, and fiddle with a bunch of switches.

Enjoy!

Software Used

  • Unreal Engine 4
  • UE Blueprint Visual Scripting
  • 3DS Max
  • Photoshop
  • Paint 3D
  • Audacity
  • Jira

Game created by: James Daniel Semilla
